title: Create command browser utility
description: Create a command discovery utility that lists all available commands in the current project, grouped by category (Task Management, Phase 0, Validation, etc.). Show brief descriptions and allow users to get details or run commands by name. This helps with workflow discovery, especially for projects with many commands like Power Query.
notes:
LOW-MEDIUM IMPACT - Phase 3 Polish. Addresses 'Workflow Discovery' pain point. Users must know command names to use them. This provides browseable catalog.

COMPLETION NOTES (2025-12-18):
- Created .claude/commands/show-commands.md
- Categorized all 15 existing commands into 6 categories:
  * Project Initialization (5 commands)
  * Task Management (4 commands)
  * Agent Orchestration (1 command)
  * Validation & Analysis (3 commands)
  * Decision Tracking (1 command)
  * Project Monitoring (1 command)
- Included usage patterns for browsing, getting details, and running commands
- Task completed faster than estimated (75 velocity) due to clear command structure
- All commands have consistent Purpose sections making categorization straightforward
user_benefit: Users can discover all available commands without reading documentation or exploring .claude/commands/ directory
